pr_title: HDDS-3819. OzoneManager#listVolumeByUser ignores userName parameter when ACL is enabled

timeline.message: Create UGI with userName as input to checkAcls.

timeline.bodyText:
Question for @xiaoyuyao here: UserGroupInformation.createRemoteUser() create a new UGI with AuthMethod.SIMPLE. Does this matter?
IMO in this case only username matters.

replies.bodyText: That should be fine in this case given the user has passed the RPC layer Kerberos auth.
